description:
Variants of the population projection

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12421 Population projections

Definition:
Assumptions underlying the 13th coordinated population
projection variants (based on: 31 December 2013):
- Variant 1 "Continued trend based on lower immigration":
G1-L1-W1
- Variant 2 "Continued trend based on higher immigration":
G1-L1-W2

G1: Birth rate 1.4 children per woman
L1: Life expectancy at birth in 2060 84.8 years for boys
and 88.8 years for girls
W1: Long-term migration balance 100,000
W2: Long-term migration balance 200,000


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2015
name: Variants of the population projection
